name: TicketNow
0:
”Alexa, open ticket now”
”Alexa, ask ticket now to create an incident”
”Alexa, ask ticket now for SLA breach”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ticket now
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The power of IT service management from ServiceNow with the convenience of Amazon Alexa makes it a no-brainer! Users will fall in love with this force. Imagine creating your incident tickets or approving your change requests by just talking to Alexa, it’s that simple. Take a test drive of ServiceNow Alexa integration with Ticket Now. It's FREE!

Follow the instructions as per the below link:

https://www.decibelapps.com/alexa-with-servicenow/

Here are the things you can do with the skill:
Alexa, open Ticket Now
Alexa, ask Ticket Now to create an incident
Alexa, ask Ticket Now for SLA breach
Alexa, ask Ticket Now to list My Incidents
Alexa, ask Ticket Now for My Approvals
Alexa, ask Ticket Now to close incident
Alexa, ask Ticket Now to add comment
Alexa, ask Ticket Now for latest comment
Alexa, ask Ticket Now for incident details

Anytime you need help with the Skill, say "Alexa, help" while using the skill.
